options.name: EXTOSC_4PLL
options.description: EXTOSC with 4x PLL, with EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits

options.name: ON
options.description: CLKOUT function is enabled; FOSC/4 clock appears at OSC2

options.name: OFF
options.description: CLKOUT function is disabled; i/o or oscillator function on OSC2

options.name: ON
options.description: Writing to NOSC and NDIV is allowed

options.name: OFF
options.description: The NOSC and NDIV bits cannot be changed by user software

VDDAR.name: VDDAR
VDDAR.description: VDD Range Analog Calibration Selection bit

options.name: HI
options.description: Internal analog systems are calibrated for operation between VDD = 2.3 - 5.5V

options.name: LO
options.description: Internal analog systems are calibrated for operation between VDD = 1.8 - 3.6V

options.name: EXTMCLR
options.description: If LVP = 0, MCLR pin is MCLR; If LVP = 1, RA3 pin function is MCLR

options.name: INTMCLR
options.description: If LVP = 0, MCLR is port-defined function; If LVP = 1, RA3 pin function is MCLR

options.name: ON
options.description: Brown-out Reset enabled, SBOREN bit is ignored

options.name: NSLEEP
options.description: Brown-out Reset enabled while running, disabled in sleep; SBOREN is ignored

options.name: SBOREN
options.description: Brown-out reset enabled according to SBOREN bit

DACAUTOEN.name: DACAUTOEN
DACAUTOEN.description: DAC Buffer Automatic Range Select Enable bit

options.name: OFF
options.description: DAC Buffer reference range is determined by the REFRNG bit

options.name: ON
options.description: DAC Buffer reference range is automatically determined by module hardware

options.name: HI
options.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage (VBOR) is set to 2.85V

options.name: OFF
options.description: ZCD module is disabled; ZCD can be enabled by setting the ZCDSEN bit of ZCDCON

options.name: ON
options.description: ZCD module is always enabled; ZCDMD and ZCDSEN bits are ignored

options.name: ON
options.description: The PPSLOCKED bit can be cleared and set only once after an unlocking sequence is executed; once PPSLOCKED is set, all future changes to PPS registers are prevented

options.name: OFF
options.description: The PPSLOCKED bit can be set and cleared as needed (unlocking sequence is required)

options.name: ON
options.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will cause a reset

options.name: OFF
options.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will not cause a reset

options.name: WDTCPS_31
options.description: Divider ratio 1:65536; software control of WDTPS

options.name: NSLEEP
options.description: WDT enabled while Sleep = 0, suspended when Sleep = 1; SEN is ignored

options.name: ON
options.description: WDT enabled regardless of Sleep; SEN bit is ignored

options.name: WDTCWS_0
options.description: window delay = 87.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required

options.name: WDTCWS_1
options.description: window delay = 75 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required

options.name: WDTCWS_2
options.description: window delay = 62.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required

options.name: WDTCWS_3
options.description: window delay = 50 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required

options.name: WDTCWS_4
options.description: window delay = 37.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required

options.name: WDTCWS_5
options.description: window delay = 25 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required

options.name: WDTCWS_6
options.description: window always open (100%); no software control; keyed access required

options.name: WDTCWS_7
options.description: window always open (100%); software control; keyed access not required

options.name: LFINTOSC
options.description: WDT reference clock is the 31.0 kHz LFINTOSC

options.name: MFINTOSC
options.description: WDT reference clock is the 32 kHz MFINTOSC

options.name: SOSC
options.description: WDT reference clock is the 32kHz secondary oscillator

options.name: OFF
options.description: Application Block is NOT write protected

options.name: OFF
options.description: Boot Block is NOT write protected

options.name: OFF
options.description: Configuration Register is NOT write protected

options.name: OFF
options.description: Data EEPROM is NOT write protected

WRTSAF.name: WRTSAF
WRTSAF.description: Storage Area Flash (SAF) Write Protection bit

options.name: ON
options.description: Low Voltage programming enabled. MCLR/Vpp pin function is MCLR. MCLRE Configuration bit is ignored

options.name: OFF
options.description: High Voltage on MCLR/Vpp must be used for programming

CP.name: CP
CP.description: Program Flash Memory Code Protection bit

options.name: OFF
options.description: Program Flash Memory code protection is disabled

options.name: ON
options.description: Program Flash Memory code protection is enabled

options.name: OFF
options.description: Data EEPROM code protection is disabled

options.name: ON
options.description: Data EEPROM code protection is enabled

nWDTWV.defaultValue: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
nWDTWV.name: nWDTWV

options.name: WDT window violation reset has occurred
options.alias: WDT window violation reset has occurred

options.name: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
options.alias: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
